body_html: I've noticed same thing on cirrascale GPU machines - putting parameters on gpu:0 and using gpu->gpu transfer was a bit faster. I suppose this depends on particular details of hardware -- if you don't have p2p connectivity between your video cards then keeping parameters on CPU:0 gives faster training.
